faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and services.

items.question: How does your pricing work?s
items.answer: Our pricing is based on a per-image model. You can choose from our Basic, Standard, or Premium plans depending on your needs. We also offer volume discounts for larger orders.s

items.question: Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?
items.answer: Yes, we offer volume discounts for bulk orders. The more images you need edited, the lower the per-image price will be. Contact us for a custom quote.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Payment is typically required before we begin work on your project.

items.question: Is there a minimum order requirement?
items.answer: No, there is no minimum order requirement. You can order as few as one image or as many as you need.

items.question: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied with our work, we will revise it until you are happy or provide a full refund.
